title: Shaping the Future of 3D Printing with Recycled Materials
author: Margaret Maina
description: E3D Print Generation is a sustainable 3D printing company focused on converting recycled materials into useful, eco-friendly products. The firm combines creativity and innovation to offer cost-effective small-scale manufacturing, prototyping, and educational programs. Its mission is to promote environmental sustainability through technology by reducing plastic waste and empowering communities to create value from recycled materials.
